name: Reflection
description: Advanced functions for interacting with raw Java classes, methods, and fields.
overview:
Advanced functions for interacting with raw Java classes, methods, and fields. This is a powerful library for deep integration with Minecraft and Java. Accessible from scripts via the global `Reflection` variable.

**Warning:** This is an advanced library. Misuse can easily lead to script errors or game crashes. A basic understanding of Java Reflection is recommended.

It exposes fields like `Reflection.classLoader` (CombinedVariableClassLoader) for advanced usage.

methods.name: getClass
methods.description: Gets a `java.lang.Class` object from its fully qualified name. This is the starting point for most reflection operations.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the class (e.g., "java.util.ArrayList"). This can be an intermediary name for Minecraft classes.

parameters.name: name2
parameters.description: An alternative (e.g., Yarn mapped) name for the class. JsMacros will try `name` first, then `name2`.

methods.name: getDeclaredMethod
methods.signature: getDeclaredMethod(Class<?> c, String name, String name2, Class<?>[] parameterTypes)
methods.description: Gets a `java.lang.reflect.Method` object from a class, including private, protected, and package-private methods. This does **not** search superclasses.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The class to search within.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the method (can be intermediary).

parameters.name: name2
parameters.description: An alternative (Yarn) name for the method.

parameters.name: parameterTypes
parameters.description: An array of class objects representing the method's parameter types.

methods.name: getMethod
methods.signature: getMethod(Class<?> c, String name, String name2, Class<?>[] parameterTypes)
methods.description: Gets a `public` `java.lang.reflect.Method` object from a class. This **does** search superclasses and interfaces.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The class to search within.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the method (can be intermediary).

parameters.name: name2
parameters.description: An alternative (Yarn) name for the method.

parameters.name: parameterTypes
parameters.description: An array of class objects representing the method's parameter types.

methods.name: getDeclaredField
methods.signature: getDeclaredField(Class<?> c, String name, String name2)
methods.description: Gets a `java.lang.reflect.Field` object from a class, including private fields. This does **not** search superclasses.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The class to search within.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the field (can be intermediary).

parameters.name: name2
parameters.description: An alternative (Yarn) name for the field.

methods.name: getField
methods.signature: getField(Class<?> c, String name, String name2)
methods.description: Gets a `public` `java.lang.reflect.Field` object from a class. This **does** search superclasses.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The class to search within.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the field (can be intermediary).

parameters.name: name2
parameters.description: An alternative (Yarn) name for the field.

methods.name: invokeMethod
methods.signature: invokeMethod(Method m, Object c, Object[] objects)
methods.description: Invokes a method on an object with the given parameters.

parameters.name: m
parameters.description: The method to invoke.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The object instance to invoke the method on. Use `null` for static methods.

parameters.name: objects
parameters.description: An array of arguments to pass to the method.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of a class by calling its constructor.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The class to instantiate.

parameters.name: objects
parameters.description: An array of arguments to pass to the constructor.

methods.name: createClassProxyBuilder
methods.description: Creates a builder to proxy or extend a Java class or interface from within the script. This allows you to implement Java interfaces or override class methods using script functions.

parameters.name: clazz
parameters.description: The class to extend. Use `null` if you are only implementing interfaces.

parameters.name: interfaces
parameters.description: An array of interfaces to implement.

methods.name: createClassBuilder
methods.signature: createClassBuilder(String cName, Class<T> clazz, Class<?>[] interfaces)
methods.description: A more advanced version of the proxy builder that uses bytecode generation to create an entirely new Java class at runtime.

parameters.name: cName
parameters.description: The fully qualified name for the new class.

parameters.name: clazz
parameters.description: The class to extend.

parameters.name: interfaces
parameters.description: An array of interfaces to implement.

methods.name: getClassFromClassBuilderResult
methods.description: Retrieves the `Class` object for a class previously created with `createClassBuilder`.

parameters.name: cName
parameters.description: The name of the class that was built.

methods.name: createLibraryBuilder
methods.signature: createLibraryBuilder(String name, boolean perExec, String[] acceptedLangs)
methods.description: Creates a builder for defining a new custom library that can be accessed by scripts.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name scripts will use to access the library (e.g., `MyLib`).

parameters.name: perExec
parameters.description: Whether the library instance is shared or unique to each script execution.

parameters.name: acceptedLangs
parameters.description: An array of language names that can use this library.

methods.name: createLibrary
methods.description: Compiles and registers a custom library from a string of Java code. The class must extend a `BaseLibrary` type and have a `@Library` annotation.

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the class.

parameters.name: javaCode
parameters.description: The Java source code for the library.

methods.name: compileJavaClass
methods.description: Compiles a string of Java code into a `Class` object at runtime.

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the class being compiled.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The Java source code.

methods.name: getCompiledJavaClass
methods.description: Retrieves the most recently compiled version of a class by its name.

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the class.

methods.name: getAllCompiledJavaClassVersions
methods.description: Retrieves all compiled versions of a class, in the order they were compiled.

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The fully qualified name of the class.

methods.name: getReflect
methods.description: Wraps an object in a jOOR `Reflect` object, which provides a fluent API for reflection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The object to wrap.

methods.name: loadJarFile
methods.description: Loads a `.jar` file into the script's classpath, making its classes available to `Reflection.getClass()`.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The path to the jar file, relative to the script's folder.

methods.name: loadCurrentMappingHelper
methods.description: Gets the currently loaded mapping helper, if any.

methods.name: getClassName
methods.description: Gets the fully qualified name of an object's class.

parameters.name: o
parameters.description: The object to inspect.

methods.name: loadMappingHelper
methods.description: Loads a Yarn mapping file (from a URL or local file) to enable the use of official class/method/field names instead of intermediary names.

parameters.name: urlorfile
parameters.description: A URL or file path to a Yarn mappings JAR or `.tiny` file.

methods.name: wrapInstace
methods.description: Wraps a Java instance for use with proxy/builder classes. An advanced feature.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: The instance to wrap.

methods.name: getWrappedClass
methods.description: Gets a wrapped class by its name. An advanced feature.

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The name of the class.
